cause.description:
My grandfather who i admired and loved died too young from this cancer. He went to little rock, Arkanas to get treated and they gave him 11 more years then expected. In his memory, I want to support everyone who has multiple myeloma.
1. Curing people is essential to human survival
2. Love those around you, and support them, through everything; CARE
cause.mission: help support the people with multiple myeloma
cause.name: multiple myeloma
